column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------  A fire broke out at 8:20 pm
column7: Kandal Market 1. The fifth-floor residence was set on  fire after the French homeowner (*Richard something
column8: given ------here------) heated his food and forgot about it
column9: causing an electrical fault. Police firefighters came down and extinguished the fire.------Authorities said the blaze destroyed a number of items but did not cause any injuries. The owner was called to the Central Market Post for education and guidance on his------ méthodes de cuisson------. ------AREY
